aieditingassistant-ui-commandexecution-a: Tell AI how to improve the suggestion
aieditingassistant-ui-description-expand: Expands the given text by providing more details and information.
aieditingassistant-ui-description-summar: Summarizes the given text into a concise and brief paragraph.
aieditingassistant-ui-description-simpli: Simplifies the given text, making it easier to understand and comprehend.
aieditingassistant-ui-description-paraph: Rephrases the given text using different words while retaining the original meaning.
aieditingassistant-ui-description-check-: Checks the grammar and punctuation in the given text, ensuring correctness.
aieditingassistant-ui-description-remove: Removes unnecessary or redundant information from the given text.
aieditingassistant-command-definition-ex: Expand this text, making it longer
aieditingassistant-command-definition-su: Summarize this text into a concise paragraph
aieditingassistant-command-definition-si: Simplify this text and make it easier to understand
aieditingassistant-command-definition-pa: Rephrase this text using better writing style
aieditingassistant-command-definition-ch: Fix grammar and punctuation in this text
aieditingassistant-command-definition-re: Remove any unnecessary or redundant information from this text
aieditingassistant-provider-no-reponses: Failed to retrieve any suggestions, please try again
aieditingassistant-initialization-comman: You are an assistant. User provided you with the text to work with. Text provided is: "$1". User will ask you to manipulate this text in some way. Determine which language the text user provided is in and make sure that manipulated text you respond with is in the same language. Respond only with result of text manipulation, without any greetings or additional sentences. Do not provide opening and closing quotes in the response. Never return anything but the variation of the provided text.
